synopsis.text:
III's journey to becoming the world's most notorious gentleman thief begins in 1960s Japan, during the country's economic boom. Based on the original manga, "LUPIN THE 3rd," this new anime, "LUPIN ZERO," follows the young Lupin III as he navigates the streets of Japan and climbs the ladder to villainy. With the legacy of his grandfather, the infamous thief Lupin I, hanging over him, young Lupin must decide whether to follow in his footsteps or become a respectable member of society.

At school, Lupin meets Daisuke Jigen, a classmate with a mercenary background who carries a gun and has a chip on his shoulder. Despite their initial differences, the two eventually find common ground in their strained relationships with their fathers. As Lupin competes against other villains in a contest to win his grandfather's villa and the title of "Lupin III," he must also navigate his complicated relationship with his father.

"LUPIN ZERO" is a nostalgic yet original story that finally reveals the untold origins of the world's greatest thief. With Lupin III's legendary status already established, this anime takes us back to where it all began, offering a fresh perspective on the beloved character. Follow young Lupin III as he embarks on a journey of self-discovery, adventure, and mischief in this exciting new series.
